Very cooling and clean, with nice strength from the ambroxan.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1622217"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1622217#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1621636" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1621636" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="masonmarie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1549071"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="masonmarie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Lipstick-Fever-60868.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60868.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lipstick Fever"title="Lipstick Fever"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1621636ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1621636" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1549071">masonmarie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-11">08/11/22 13:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>tennis balls and dirt after the rain. nice for the office for me and I really dig the sporty feel.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1621636"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1621636#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1604302" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1604302" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kenzzz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1534187"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kenzzz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1604302ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1604302" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1534187">Kenzzz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-16">07/16/22 10:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this. Im not a huge patchouli fan, and this is very heavy on patchouli on my skin, but it is balanced enough with fresher notes (I assume the juniper berries and ozonic notes) that it makes it wearable. I didnt love it on paper but its much nicer on my skin. It is definitely earthy and reminds me of muddy springtime hikes and fall leaves in a good way. I would classify this as completely unisex (Im a 20 year old woman), though some may find it ever so slightly masculine. Longevity and sillage are good, as should be expected for the ridiculous price. Not a safe blind-buy, and not an everyday perfume for me personally, but quite nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1604302"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1604302#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1602545" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1602545" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AlecGutteridge"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1454977"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1454977.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AlecGutteridge" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Histoires-de-Parfums/1740-Marquis-de-Sade-8590.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8590.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1740 Marquis de Sade"title="1740 Marquis de Sade"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1602545ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1602545" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1454977">AlecGutteridge</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-13">07/13/22 19:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Started off very sharp, medicinal, and artificial. Turned into the scent of an overchlorinated pool with a bunch of pooltoys that have been sitting out in the sun. First perfume that I've ever had to scrub - usually I can withstand scents just to see if they get better in the drydown. 1/10 only because somewhere in the background there does exist a good petrichor accord.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1602545"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1602545#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1601348" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1601348" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lyrlc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528797"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lyrlc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/The-Noir-29-31872.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31872.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Noir 29"title="The Noir 29"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1601348ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1601348" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528797">lyrlc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-11">07/11/22 23:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>immediately after i sprayed, this smelled like halls honey cough drops and vicks vapor rub. it's a very strong artificial/chemical medicinal smell...  after like 30min to an hour it starts to smell better, a bit like creosote but slightly sweeter smelling. i'm assuming that's the patchouli and the juniper berries. it's all i can really smell... not the kind of petrichor smell i was looking for though unfortunately, wish there was more of a noticeable woodsy/musky note<br />
my mom tried it on and the patchouli note is much stronger on her than me. on her, it just smells like a sweet crisp creosote bush. not so much of the artificial smell. might've been just how it was on me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1601348"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1601348#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1590379" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1590379" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RisingChaos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1352837"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1352837.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RisingChaos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1590379ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1590379" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1352837">RisingChaos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-23">06/23/22 22:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A light, airy, and heavily watered-down sweet patchouli. Like a rainy forest floor where all the leaves are patchouli, but it's still pouring so you can hardly smell anything else. I can barely pick this up straight out of the gate. Minimal projection, skin scent after an hour tops, but longevity 10-12hr.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1590379"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1590379#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1590172" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1590172" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="skybunny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251259"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1251259.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="skybunny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Memoir-Woman-10146.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10146.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Memoir Woman"title="Memoir Woman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1590172ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1590172" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251259">skybunny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-23">06/23/22 14:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What I'm about to write might be shocking to some, but.... Baie 19 smells like the paper prize tickets from Chuck E. Cheese, circa mid to late 1990's. Unfuckingbelievable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1590172"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1590172#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1582052" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1582052" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sa_San_Bon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220468"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1220468.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sa_San_Bon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nasomatto/Fantomas-62775.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62775.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fantomas"title="Fantomas"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1582052ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1582052" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220468">Sa_San_Bon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-10">06/10/22 20:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love Baie 19 very much. It reminds me of two things I love very much: gin and rain. I am obsessed with "rain note" in perfume. I remember how amazed I was when I first read about petrichor, the word itself is fascinating: petra/stone+ichor/the fluid which runs through the veins of gods...<br />
Petrichor, the distinct way that dry earth smells after the rain, comes in part from bacteria in the soil that release a chemical compound called Geosmin. It's quite "natural" to be so attracted to this smell because we are extremely sensitive to this smell and our ancestors relied on rain to survive. And I really miss rain living in the desert.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1582052"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1582052#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1579138" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1579138" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jmac88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462065"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1462065.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jmac88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Gentlemen-Only-Absolute-38932.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38932.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentlemen Only Absolute"title="Gentlemen Only Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1579138ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1579138" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462065">Jmac88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-06">06/06/22 19:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really enjoy this one. Great performance. I sprayed escentric 01 over this after about 8 hours or so, well into the dry down. I dont know if it just pushed the dry down out harder or changed the fragrance profile but holy smokes did it knock my socks off. I was walking around and trying to figure out who smelled so good, turns out it was me ;)<br />
<br />
Update: I let this get old, and it went baaaad. Smells like a freshly serviced porta potty now.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1579138"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1579138#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1575223" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1575223" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ShionClover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1373798"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ShionClover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1575223ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1575223" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1373798">ShionClover</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-01">06/01/22 01:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells quite different when put on different body parts... Sweet green on wrist, watery green on forearm, medical mint on body. So strange! Maybe temperature related?<br />
Overall, a clean green scent. Sillage is strong so I rather use it in outdoor event.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1575223"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1575223#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1571154" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1571154" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tolkashutka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1282717"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1282717.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tolkashutka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Lui-45660.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45660.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lui"title="Lui"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1571154ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1571154" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1282717">Tolkashutka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-25">05/25/22 19:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Look, I'm all for some "out there" atmospherics (LOVE the combination of Alkemia's Gaea + Mists Becoming Rain), but this just didn't hit that mark for me. <br />
<br />
It opened extremely medicinal on me, to the point that I nearly scrubbed it off. I decided to persist, and see if it got better in the dry down. I'm usually pretty tolerant of patchouli, but this was nearly overwhelmingly featuring patchouli + "damp". Not petrichor, not a rainy, dreamy cottage somewhere in the woods... just a wet overdone hippy patchouli wearing bandaids and Vicks Vapor Rub. <br />
<br />
I really want to like Le Labo, but I have yet to find one from this house that catches my interest. =/</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1571154"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1571154#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1570468" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1570468" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mouse011"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178077"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1178077.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mouse011" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/SpongeBob-Squarepants/SpongeBob-28286.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28286.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="SpongeBob"title="SpongeBob"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1570468ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1570468" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178077">Mouse011</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-24">05/24/22 16:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Le Labo has a couple of highly underated gems, which they are all in the shadow of Santal 33.<br />
Particulary im not a patchouli fan, but this was something special for me, it has blows me away from the first testing.<br />
Because is very conceptual, it's more about the question of "sense" than the particulary fragrance.<br />
Exctualy it smells like the petrichor, not woods, not mosses, just like naturalistic smell of the soil after the heavy rain somwhere in the urban comunity.<br />
Watery, ozonic, fresh spicy and green.<br />
One of the best relases from the house of Le Labo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1570468"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1570468#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1562303" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1562303" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Unmodernize"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/948972"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.948972.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Unmodernize" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Baldessarini/Baldessarini-Black-56762.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56762.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Baldessarini Black"title="Baldessarini Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1562303ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1562303" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/948972">Unmodernize</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-12">05/12/22 08:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wet, flowery. Nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1562303"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1562303#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1561051" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1561051" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dramaloladiva"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309211"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1309211.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dramaloladiva" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Gris-Montaigne-17842.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17842.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gris Montaigne"title="Gris Montaigne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1561051ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1561051" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309211">Dramaloladiva</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-10">05/10/22 11:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Baie 19 smells minty to me. But not the bubblegum mint kind, more like if you plucked a mint leaf from the plant, crushed it and brought it to your nose. You are in a garden and it has just being watered and you smell the wet earth, the other plants and the crushed mint leafThe clouds in the sky are gray and its threatening to rain imminently, the air has this smell quality just before a stormit smells wonderful and alien as well<br />
Baie 19 smells magical to me and I wish it wasnt so darn expensive because Id get myself a bottle and treasure it!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1561051"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1561051#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1555808" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1449134">silthrill</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-02">05/02/22 20:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is exactly what I smell when I have a cold- when I make myself a mint tea and coat my chest in vaporub and occasionally stick the Vick's Nose Inhalers up my nose :D. It's not a horrible scent if you want to smell like a minty stick of gum. I smell a LOT of eucalyptus here - actually might be refreshing on a hot summer day. And to be fair there is a little touch of juniper berry. Overall a very unique scent - fresh and clean and minty</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1555808"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1555808#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1555078" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1019527">Josu01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-23">04/23/22 16:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a nice little jewel by Le Labo.  Baie 19 smells so different from... everything; this is confusingly strange and lovely at the same time. For me this is really a masterpiece. It smells fresh and clean, and the petrichor note lasts and lasts. Baie 19 evoques for me a cottage in the forest during a rainy day.  Simple and beautiful. <br />
<br />
On my skin Baie 19 radiates and lasts for about 6-7h. I have a 5ml sample from the Discovery Set, and I think I'm ready to go for a FB... even if it's only a 50 ml. <br />
Love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1549444"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1549444#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1546282" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; What a surprise! It's like the lovechild of Narciso Rodriguez for her (pink) and Jo Malone's Pomegranate Noir. With Pomegranate Noir giving it more dominant features. I'm surprised pomegranate isn't listed as one of the notes. The longevity is marvelous!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1546282"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1546282#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1533856" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I love the juniper, aldehydes, ozone, and musk. <br />
<br />
I'll also add that performance, particularly longevity is fantastic. I put it on 12 hours ago, went hiking and took a shower and it's still on my skin. <br />
Fantastic juice!<br />
<br />
Scent 9/10<br />
Performance 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1533856"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1533856#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1526180" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1526180" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="adelaidesandrina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347872"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1347872.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="adelaidesandrina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/R-E-M-62578.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62578.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="R.E.M."title="R.E.M."></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1526180ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1526180" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347872">adelaidesandrina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-19">03/19/22 03:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Baie 19 to me is one of the most confusing fragrance ive ever smelled! Definitely not in a bad way though. I can only think of two things about this one: <br />
<br />
1) it smells like an old garden after the rain. Wet soil, dying trees, rainwater dripping everywhere and the cold air surrounding it. <br />
<br />
2) @bergamotted nailed it! it does smell like as if the doctors office is flooded with rainwater lmao. Its very cold and antiseptic like in some way<br />
<br />
Very interesting fragrance for sure. One of the best le labo creations out there, since its so complex and well made.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1526180"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1526180#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1518655" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1518655" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="boreganic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1292756"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="boreganic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1518655ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1518655" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1292756">boreganic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-07">03/07/22 21:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Baie 19 smells exactly like a garden after fresh rain baking in the hot sun. Fantastic fragrance although a bit too feminine for me personally. I think If it wasnt so crazy expensive Id still wear it from time to time as Im a huge sucker for petrichor. This scent reminds me of a woman whose house is filled from top to bottom with plants and has a love for nature. This is my favorite Lelabo fragrance. Highly recommend if you can afford it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1518655"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1518655#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1509710" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1509710" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nelliebabes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328579"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1328579.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nelliebabes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1509710ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1509710" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328579">nelliebabes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-22">02/22/22 10:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Okay so I have a sample of the fragrance- and a full size of the lotion. The fragrance has these dense, heavy, almost musky notes that are fecal and unappealing. <br />
<br />
But the lotion is amazing!!!! Absolutely none of the heavy notes. Just fresh, wet, petrichor. Clean, fresh, scent unlike anything I've smelled before. Also super long lasting.. fades into a soft cleaaaannnn "clothes hang drying" scent. <br />
<br />
Lasts a full day at work and is ACTUALLY hydrating as well. A lot of fragranced lotions are thin and poor quality.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1509710"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1509710#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1505281" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1505281" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perrynelson777"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311421"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1311421.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perrynelson777" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Ombre-Leather-2018-50239.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50239.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ombr Leather (2018)"title="Ombr Leather (2018)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1505281ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1505281" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311421">Perrynelson777</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-16">02/16/22 03:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I put this on last night without looking up any notes or reviews and I kept thinking it reminded me of carmex lip balm. I finally realized that it actually smells alot like Vicks Vapo products (menthol). After about 1-2 hours it dries down and the menthol isn't so much in the front anymore and it's slighy herbaceous. Overall, it's  not amazing or bad. I would recommend this one for someone who likes the smell of menthol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1505281"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1505281#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1493498" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1475656" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fennecove"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1429498"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1429498.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fennecove" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rook-Perfumes/Forest-50269.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50269.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Forest"title="Forest"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1475656ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1475656" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1429498">fennecove</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-03">01/03/22 14:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm pretty new to the smelling game and pretty bad at it and usually I just get one overall impression rather than any ability to pick out notes. So I thought my review might help others like me who might have a smell experience closer to mine than that of those here who are more experienced. And that review is this:<br />
<br />
Melons. It's wet for sure but it smells like melon juice to me. Maybe a little leaf-y and that's about it. It's nice enough.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1475656"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1475656#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1474829" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1474829" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fougereaboutit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1438816"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1438816.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fougereaboutit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marissa-Zappas/Petrichor-71854.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71854.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Petrichor"title="Petrichor"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1474829ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1474829" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1438816">fougereaboutit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-02">01/02/22 05:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, this just smelled like a crappy plastic kids toy in a doctor's office. Sterile, surgical, and absolutely none of the wet, warm, and organic smell of rain.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1474829"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1474829#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1467315" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1467315" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vlrtualboy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1343344"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1343344.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vlrtualboy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DS-Durga/Steamed-Rainbow-79740.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79740.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Steamed Rainbow"title="Steamed Rainbow"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1467315ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1467315" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1343344">vlrtualboy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-20">12/20/21 14:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's reminiscent of petrichor *eventually*, once the overpowering VapoRub smell fades away. Definitely prefer Olympic Orchids Night Flyer for this kind of "wet earth" smell even if its a little dirtier. The drydown is really nice and fresh but the weird menthol quality makes it kind of like the inside of a day spa rather than like the ground after rain.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1467315"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1467315#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1465955" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1465955" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="godzeke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1429014"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1429014.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="godzeke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1465955ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1465955" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1429014">godzeke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-18">12/18/21 09:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was a letdown for me, when I read the reviews I thought it would smell like rain or a rainy storm. To me it smelled like sweet berries and a weird chlorine smell, definitely smelled pretty pool water-like but not like rain. Definitely leans more to the feminine side.<br />
<br />
3.5/10 for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1465955"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1465955#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1450706" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1450706" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="njwooding"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293100"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293100.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="njwooding" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1450706ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1450706" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); Very weak, does smell like wet outdoors. Worth a sniff if you like subdue, natural scents that aren't super green or flowery.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1450706"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1450706#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1449849" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1449849" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="discardedandroid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1239217"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1239217.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="discardedandroid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1449849ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1449849" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);
