padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1293830" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="santal33assbitch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259538"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="santal33assbitch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1293830ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1293830" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259538">santal33assbitch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-16">02/16/21 17:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>broo I saw someone say this smells like a healthfood store I'm dead  spot on</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1293830"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1293830#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1291687" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1291687" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AAHSmellingGood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1252002"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AAHSmellingGood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1291687ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1291687" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1252002">AAHSmellingGood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-12">02/12/21 18:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simple, clean and fresh in my opinion.  I think it is "nice" but I would not purchase a full bottle at Le Labo prices.  In the style - petrichor, I much prefer Frederic M.'s Fresh Lover.  Much more sophisticated.  Perhaps not as summer appropriate but still superior, particularly if you want to shell out the money.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1291687"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1291687#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1277402" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1277402" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yugihoez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1295975"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="yugihoez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1277402ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1277402" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1295975">yugihoez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-17">01/17/21 06:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Alluring, seductive, and cold---this ain't for the faint of heart. The scent is quite bold, giving you an almost menthol-like rush upon inhaling. It's designed to linger after you walk by for good reason. It certainly adds to your statement of self. This perfume is the scent of Slytherins.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1277402"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1277402#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1273691" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1273691" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vespertine__Milo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75150"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.75150.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vespertine__Milo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1273691ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1273691" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75150">Vespertine__Milo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-10">01/10/21 08:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is simply magnificent. If perfume afficionado and non-sexy but captivating smells amateur (especially herbs and patchouli) you will fall in love with it instantly. Le Labo has a uncanny ability to create compositions modern yet very naturalistic, which in other perfume houses would be called as difficult, apothecary type and simply unwearable. So if you like patchouli, herbs, earthy feeling and yet you would not like to be taken as smelling like Sleepy Walkers or Zombie you should find this scent highly likeable. We can find in it earthy, patchouli and herbal -healing mix types of notes which are covered skillfully by some modern quilt of ozon notes giving it a lighter feeling. Absolute beauty. And please, do not be discouraged by other negative opinions - this is a no scent for typical amateurs of easy and likeable, neutral scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1273691"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1273691#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1268689" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1268689" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shashamo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/255530"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="shashamo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1268689ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1268689" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/255530">shashamo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-01">01/01/21 01:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Strange. I don't see much reason that I would like this perfum but I have to have it. This perfume reminds me an image of being inside the isolated cabin warming up in front of firewood while it's pouring outside. It's cold but warm. It's lonely but so comfortable. There was this urge of keep wanting to smell this scent because this is so comforting. It smells almost exactly the scent of  ground when it rains first time in fall. I love this and I almost like some people hate this :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1268689"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1268689#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1262098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1262098" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BjiZZle_MaNNizle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1209355"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1209355.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BjiZZle_MaNNizle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57513.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Baie 19"title="Baie 19"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1262098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1262098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1209355">BjiZZle_MaNNizle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-17">12/17/20 05:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the first "petrichor" I've tried, and quite honestly it's very close to what I had hoped for. On my skin I get enticing and slightly melancholic aquatic and earthy notes. A very unique scent, yet simultaneously familiar. The aquatic note leans "green" and the earthy note is that of moist fresh earth. I would've hoped for something a little more subtle and ozonic, but for those who want something strong and punchy, this fragrance is beastly.<br />
<br />
The fragrance also has quite a chemical-like smell lurking around the top. Thankfully the smell disappears around the mid dry-down. Note that other folks may not notice it in your scent trail. My wife didn't notice it and in fact really liked the smell of the fragrance in the air. <br />
<br />
The overall scent doesn't change or evolve too much. But then I didn't want it to. <br />
   <br />
As a final, throw-away note, I can't shake the thought that this is a lovechild between airy aquatic Cool Water and inky earthy Encre Noire.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1262098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1262098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1259222" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1259222" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Notycd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/594786"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.594786.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Notycd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1259222ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1259222" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/594786">Notycd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-10">12/10/20 09:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Like Le Labo says: nothing smells like it. I fully agree, but I will try to put it into words. Baie 19 smells like returning from a long walk. You know, "you smell like outside". That. <br />
<br />
It's clean and abstract but has this earthy cast to it. Although it does evoke a feeling, it's pretty cold and apathic. No warming or uplifting notes here, but that's what makes this so good. <br />
<br />
As with most Le Labo fragrances, this is 100% linear. It also lasts for weeks on clothing. Sillage is good, perfect for this kind of scent. Think of it as a grown up version of Santal 33. Santal 33 is like a Gucci belt and Balenciaga sneakers. Baie 19 is a The Row jacket. <br />
<br />
Now, this is not for an inexperienced nose. Reviews here are very mixed. You won't like this if you're unfamiliar with these more 'raw' fragraces. That being said, this does smell great on someone else. (And would be irresistible on that sweatshirt you stole from your lover.)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1259222"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1259222#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1258905" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1258905" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bourcet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1090870"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1090870.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bourcet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Rehab-50351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rehab"title="Rehab"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1258905ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1258905" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1090870">bourcet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-09">12/09/20 15:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've smelled worse! I mean, what's so bad about this one? To me it just smells like copier toner and straight up patchouli essential oil. Like the thick, resinous kind that clogs up the plastic orifice of the bottle. I struggle with classifying this as petrichor; it just doesn't read as rain to me. It does have an exciting energy behind it, like some kind of plant alkaloid. It's been a while, but I'm just gonna go there: this smells a lot like cocaine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1258905"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1258905#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1258686" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1258686" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="meadow28"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1261755.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="meadow28" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49104.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tam Dao Eau de Parfum"title="Tam Dao Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1258686ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1258686" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261755">meadow28</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-09">12/09/20 06:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells like cough drops. not a bad thing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1258686"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1258686#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1257710" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1257710" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fragrancemusing"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274631"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="fragrancemusing" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1257710ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1257710" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274631">fragrancemusing</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-07">12/07/20 02:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not really drawn to this.. yes it smells damp, watery, like a mossy green pond on a cool evening. But it is not an inviting scent that draws people to you. I agree with most reviewers, it also has a medicinal quality to it - "wood-panelled apothecary" is a very succinct way to describe it. If i smell a stranger wearing this after a long day at work, i might think he works in a very old pharmacy preparing medicine all day long.. it's a scent that brings out very cold and unemotional feelings in me. <br />
<br />
I think these notes might work for a home or indoor fragrance. But it doesn't really work for body fragrance... not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1257710"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1257710#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1249157" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/268860">rickyrebarco</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-15">11/15/20 20:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Damp dirt, too much patchouli, medicinal unpleasantness in background with a couple of red berries thrown in.  This smells truly horrid on my skin.  There are fragrances that are an ode to rain and dampness that are brilliant, like Zoologist Bat, but this is not one of them.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1249157"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1249157#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1241446" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1241446"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1241446#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1238837" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1238837" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="corinmelody"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/3294"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.3294.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="corinmelody" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Heures-d-Absence-59485.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59485.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Heures d'Absence"title="Heures d'Absence"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1238837ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1238837" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/3294">corinmelody</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-20">10/20/20 01:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first impression was awkward. <br />
I sniffed it on a test strip and it smelt like hospital - It was a mix of medicines, chemicals and disinfectants to my nose. I don't hate it but I certainly did not like it. <br />
<br />
I bought a discovery set anyway, mostly because of Rose 31. <br />
<br />
So I tested it again, this time on my own skin. It smells a bit sweet in the first few minutes, but soon after that it's gone, and it shifts to something..."watery" (not "aquatic" though). It smells like wet soil and/ or dirt in the woods, I can almost see myself picking up wet dirt and smear it over my body, but it is not quite petrichor (as others have described) on my skin.<br />
<br />
I still wouldn't say I like it, but it is certainly something interesting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1238837"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1238837#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1238561" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1236219" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jamcd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257368"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1257368.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jamcd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1236219ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1236219" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257368">jamcd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-13">10/13/20 10:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pure Tiger Balm on the opening and evolves into a mildly earthy, herby scent over the next few hours. Not unpleasant. Evokes a wood-panelled apothecary to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1236219"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1236219#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1227671" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1227671" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nazus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1256019"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nazus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1227671ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1227671" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1227671"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1227671#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1222412" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1222412" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="patrick.herron"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1150270"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="patrick.herron" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/House-of-Matriarch/Orca-35453.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35453.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Orca"title="Orca"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1222412ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1222412" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1150270">patrick.herron</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-09">09/09/20 20:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>it's simply brilliant. brings levity to the cold weight winter and gravity to the ephemeral heat of july. air earth and water with enough sharp vegetal to make it feel alive. one of the best petrichor/geosmin scents ever. i have also gotten a ton of compliments for it from people I know to be quite selective (or at least I did before this durned plague came down upon us).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1222412"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1222412#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1220168" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1220168" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maitton"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/964648"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.964648.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="maitton" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Issey-Miyake/L-Eau-d-Issey-pour-Homme-Solar-Lavender-90129.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90129.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Eau d'Issey pour Homme Solar Lavender"title="L'Eau d'Issey pour Homme Solar Lavender"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1220168ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1220168" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/964648">maitton</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-04">09/04/20 04:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Green garden smell with a bit of camphor minty wet notes. <br />
<br />
It resembles to me humidity that evaporates from green plants when you walk through nature, and on the same time imagine you would be chewing a mint and get that up your nose together. Unique blend that does not resemble anything I have smelled so far, modern facets, fresh and a bit musky dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1220168"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1220168#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1215140" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1215140" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="carolinencarter"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/177989"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.177989.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="carolinencarter" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Aura-Mugler-45639.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45639.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aura Mugler"title="Aura Mugler"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1215140ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1215140" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/177989">carolinencarter</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-23">08/23/20 10:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm having a hard time wrapping my head around this one. On initial spray it has an intense burning rubber smell (that weirdly I don't actually dislike) then I get this familiar screechy powdery rose scent that reminds me of Stella McCartney for women. It then softens a bit and smells like Camphor lotion that you would buy at whole foods combined with a sort of menthol vick's vapo rub smell. <br />
<br />
I don't not like it.... I think I have to give it more time. It seems to be becoming slightly more juniper berry and powder as it dries down. I could see people not immediately identify this as a perfume and being like "whats that smell?" it's the type of scent you want to spritz straight up and quickly walk through to give yourself a sort of ambiance rather than a full strengh cologne straight on the neck.<br />
I could see this growing on me, I will give it more time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1215140"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1215140#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1208902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1208902" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Svaness"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249415"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1249415.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Svaness" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/L-Eau-de-Neroli-3835.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3835.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Eau de Neroli"title="L'Eau de Neroli"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1208902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1208902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249415">Svaness</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-08">08/08/20 03:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is very linear and reminds me of tiger balm and some lipbalms. The longevity is i impressing, and what you smell in the opening is what you get all the way. The petrichor smell is there. After wearing it for a day, the next morning it really did resemble the waterdrenched garden outside, but with a camphor like edge and some traces of oil. It doesnt smell like what you exspect from a perfume, but it smells clean, and to me somewhat comforting. <br />
<br />
In my mind it could suit someone with a outdoor kind of job.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1208902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1208902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1206818" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/17411">rithacha</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-17">07/17/20 13:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Baie 19 really stood out when I tested it and I couldnt compare it to other perfumes, only the scent itself of acid rain in a post-apocalyptic city. It smells like concrete and decomposition, peaty minerals, and moisture. If I had to squint for notes, Id say theres definitely patchouli... but thats about all I recognize, its much more of an olfactory experience than anything resembling traditional perfumery for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1200799"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1200799#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1187887" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1187887" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="oneofheralteregos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1219595"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1219595.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="oneofheralteregos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Gaiac-10-Tokyo-6335.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6335.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gaiac 10 Tokyo"title="Gaiac 10 Tokyo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1187887ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1187887" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1219595">oneofheralteregos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-06-13">06/13/20 11:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very very very intoxicating without being anything close to cloying.<br />
The kind of fragrance that gets noticed everytime you move.<br />
Green, fresh, relaxing scent.<br />
This is exactly what they claimed to be, a petrichor.<br />
If Im not mistaken, this has similar DNA to le labo city exclusive Gaiac 10, its like gaiacs fresh charismatic older sibling.<br />
Lasts all day on my skin (i live in tropical country) with very good sillage and projection.<br />
Very versatile and office friendly too<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1187887"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1187887#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1186919" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1186919"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1186919#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1178880" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1178880" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Otjello"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1179358"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1179358.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Otjello" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Uomo-Born-In-Roma-Yellow-Dream-64614.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64614.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Yellow Dream"title="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Yellow Dream"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1178880ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1178880" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1179358">Otjello</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-22">05/22/20 06:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice, but nothing out of the ordinary here, although? It is good, soft lingering green leafy earthy and fresh. I can imagine walking in a forest which is wet and damp of the rainfall. I do like ELDO Hermann better though, much better petrichor note i think. Now that's said, i can certainly wear this any rainy day, or as an office scent. Good. 87<br />
<br />
<br />
Edit 28-5:<br />
The more i wear it , the better it gets. It's good, very good. This is one of those fragrances that grow on me! It's perfect for summer wear too. 92</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1178880"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1178880#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1178045" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1178045" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WKC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170549"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1170549.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="WKC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1178045ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1178045" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); Although initially unique, I feel it falls a bit flat as it dries into something not very memorable. <br />
<br />
8/10 for originality with good performance, unisex, versatile.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57513"comment_id="1178045"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Baie-19-57513.html?ccid=1178045#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1170437" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
